mapper.select: select b.* from bookweb.books b inner join bookweb.bookshelf s on b.bookName = s.bookName where s.email = #{email}
select s.bookName from bookweb.bookshelf s where s.email=#{email} and s.bookName =#{bookName}
mapper.delete: delete from bookweb.bookshelf where email=#{email} and bookName=#{bookName}
